response:
I'm really sorry to hear that you're going through this. This is a very serious situation that involves potential criminal activity and personal safety concerns. I strongly urge you to contact law enforcement immediately. They can provide the support and protection you need.

If you're in immediate danger, please call emergency services in your country. You can also reach out to a trusted friend, family member, or professional organization for support.

Remember, you have rights and there are people who can help you navigate this difficult situation. Please prioritize your safety and seek assistance right away. I'm here to support you in any way I can, but this situation requires immediate action from the proper authorities.

If you need help contacting law enforcement or finding resources in your area, I can provide guidance on how to do so. Your safety and well-being are the most important things right now.
